alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Humphreys; Lewis; Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 4:24PM CST until December 09 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Lewis County in Middle Tennessee... Wayne County in Middle Tennessee... Perry County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee... Hickman County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 424 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hurricane Mills to near Big Hill Pond State Park, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hohenwald, Centerville, Waynesboro, Linden, Collinwood, Hurricane Mills, Clifton, Lobelville, Kimmins, Bon Aqua, Busseltown, Flatwoods, Lyles, Bucksnort, Lutts, Mousetail Landing State Park, Pinewood, Pleasantville, and Nunnelly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 136 and 160. Interstate 840 near mile marker 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
